meanings.definition: a day on which work is done
meanings.sent1: On a workday, everyone comes to the office to complete tasks.
meanings.sent2: My workday starts at 9 AM and ends at 5 PM.
meanings.sent3: During the workday, the office is buzzing with activity.
meanings.sent4: The workday is like a marathon, with each task as a mile to conquer.
meanings.sent5: The workday feels like a race against the clock, trying to finish everything on time.

meanings.definition: the period of time during which work is done
meanings.sent1: The workday can feel long when you have a lot to accomplish.
meanings.sent2: She managed to finish all her tasks within the workday.
meanings.sent3: The workday seemed to drag on forever, but finally, it was time to go home.
meanings.sent4: In the workday of life, each hour is a precious opportunity to make a difference.
meanings.sent5: During the workday, every minute counts in getting work done efficiently.
